default:
This is the help menu!

Pick one of these categories : 
>help general
>help quests
>help points
>help admin

general.ping: Shows the latency of the bot(ms)

quests.quest:
Gets more information about a quest
```txt
Usage : >quest {id}```
quests.quest_list:
Gets list of all quests
```txt
Usage : >quest_list {page}```

points.profile:
Shows your stats, like points and completed quests
```txt
Usage : >profile {ping user}(optional)```
points.leaderboard: Displays the leaderboard of all users, ranked by points and quests completed

quests.add_quest:
Adds a quest
Sorry that this is so complicated, its the only simple way to do this
```txt
Usage : >add_quest
"name={name}"
"description={description}"
"rewards={rewards}"
"points={points}"```
quests.complete_quest:
Completes a quest for the user
```txt
Usage : >complete_quest {ping user} {quest id}```
quests.close_quest:
Closes an ongoing quest
```txt
Usage : >close_quest {quest id}```
quests.open_quest:
Opens a non-ongoing quest
```txt
Usage : >open_quest {quest id}```
quests.delete_quest:
Deletes a quest
WARNING : You cannot undo this!
```txt
Usage : >delete_quest {quest id}```

points.give_points:
Gives points to a singular/multiple user
```txt
Usage : >give_points {ping user(can be multiple)} {amount of points (can be negative)}```
